sentences.en: Astronauts in flight must adjust themselves to weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 宇航员在飞行中必须适应失重.

sentences.en: Astronauts in flight must adjust to weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 宇航员在飞行中得适应失重状态.

sentences.en: He came closest to visiting alien worlds through his love of deep-sea diving, its weightlessness and strange life forms.
sentences.cn: 他以他深海潜水般的爱去做外星世界访问，探寻那里的失重状态和奇异的生命形式。

sentences.en: He loved thefeeling of weightlessness and the excitement and adventure of it all.
sentences.cn: 不过他喜欢在水下失重的感觉和冒险时带给他内心的那种兴奋。

sentences.en: He then remembers time slowing down, a sensation of weightlessness, and a deafening explosion.
sentences.cn: 然后他记得时间好像慢了下来，一种失重的感觉，还有震耳欲聋的爆炸声。

sentences.en: If you travel into space in a spaceship, you must adjust ( yourself ) to weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 如果你乘航天飞船进入太空, 你必须调整自己,以适应失重状态.

sentences.en: In this machine you can experience the weightlessness of space travel.
sentences.cn: 在这台机器上,你能体会到太空旅行的失重感觉.

sentences.en: In weightlessness, a drop of liquid takes a spherical shape.
sentences.cn: 在失重状态下, 一滴液体呈球形.

sentences.en: It is a condition of weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 就是处于一种失重状态.

sentences.en: It tested instruments for controlling a vehicle in the weightlessness of space.
sentences.cn: 试验了在太空失重状态下操纵航天器的仪器.

sentences.en: Many astronauts have testified to the exhilaration of weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 许多宇航员都证实了失重的兴奋感.

sentences.en: Objective To confirm the tail - suspended rat model for the study of countermeasures against weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 目的确定中长期失重防护措施研究的模拟失重动物模型.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the protective effects of Digoxin on atrioventricular function in rats after simulated weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 目的应用高频超声心动图观察地高辛干预尾吊模拟失重大鼠心功能变化情况,评估药物作用.

sentences.en: Objective To observe bone mass changes during convalescence after simulated weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 目的观察模拟失重恢复期骨质的变化.

sentences.en: Objective To study changes in ultrastructure of soleus muscle spindle induced by simulated weightlessness in rats.
sentences.cn: 目的观察模拟失重不同时期大鼠比目鱼肌肌梭超微结构的改变.

sentences.en: Objective To study the effects of short - term simulated weightlessness on human vectorcardiogram ( VCG ).
sentences.cn: 目的探讨短期-6°头低位卧床模拟失重对人心电向量图 ( vectorcardiogram,VCG ) 的影响.

sentences.en: Objectives : To investigate the microflora in rats gastrointestinal under simulated weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究模拟失重条件下大鼠肠道菌群变化情况.

sentences.en: The astronauts also spun gyroscopes and swung a ball on its tether to show how weightlessness affects objects in motion.
sentences.cn: 宇航员们同时也用旋转陀螺仪和摇摆球上的绳子来展示失重影响运动中的物体。

sentences.en: To apply engineering Methods : To the study of astronaut adaptation to weightlessness.
sentences.cn: 应用 工程方法 于宇航员在无重状态下的适应性研究.
